hero.title: AI-Powered Trading Analysis
hero.subtitle: Experience the future of trading with real-time AI analysis, pattern detection, and intelligent insights.

about.title: What is TradeIQ?
about.description: TradeIQ combines advanced artificial intelligence with real-time market data to provide traders with unprecedented insights into market patterns, trends, and opportunities. Our platform analyzes thousands of data points every second to deliver actionable intelligence when you need it most.

patternDetection.title: Pattern Detection
patternDetection.description: Advanced AI algorithms identify chart patterns and trading signals with high accuracy.

trendAnalysis.title: Trend Analysis
trendAnalysis.description: Real-time trend analysis powered by machine learning to spot market movements.

volatilityHeatmaps.title: Volatility Heatmaps
volatilityHeatmaps.description: Visual representation of market volatility across different assets and timeframes.

aiInsights.title: AI Insights
aiInsights.description: Personalized trading insights and recommendations based on your trading style.

reducedSubjectivity.title: Reduced Subjectivity
reducedSubjectivity.description: Remove emotional bias from trading decisions with data-driven analysis.

fasterDecisions.title: Faster Decisions
fasterDecisions.description: Make informed trading decisions in seconds, not hours.

practicalEducation.title: Practical Education
practicalEducation.description: Learn advanced trading concepts through real-world examples and AI guidance.

higherPrecision.title: Higher Precision
higherPrecision.description: Increase your trading accuracy with AI-powered pattern recognition.

learningSection.title: Master Trading with AI
learningSection.description: Our comprehensive learning platform combines theoretical knowledge with practical AI-driven insights.

fundamentals.title: Trading Fundamentals
fundamentals.description: Learn the basics of trading with interactive lessons and real-time examples.

patterns.title: Chart Patterns
patterns.description: Master chart pattern recognition with AI-powered analysis and detection.

riskManagement.title: Risk Management
riskManagement.description: Develop robust risk management strategies using AI-driven insights.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.successDescription: Your password has been updated successfully.

resetPassword.passwordRequirementsHint: At least 8 characters, 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 number, 1 special character

resetPassword.passwordNeedsUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
resetPassword.passwordNeedsLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter

resetPassword.passwordNeedsSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character

resetPassword.validatingTokenDescription: Please wait while we validate your password reset token...
resetPassword.tokenValidatedDescription: You can now set your new password.
resetPassword.invalidSession: Invalid session. Please request a new reset link.
